text: Agek, Jisas agak, Bɨ olap tɨkjakɨl, bɨ omɨŋal kɨlop mani ogɨnap ñɨnɨgab agak. Olap nop 500 kina ñɨl, olap nop 50 kina ñɨl gɨnɨgab agak. Pen kɨdek bɨ omɨŋal anɨb ak, pen ñeb tek ma yek agak. Bɨ mani ñɨnɨgab anɨb ak, kɨlop agɨnɨgab, Mani ñɨlop ñɨbin ak, pen ñɨnɨgul agɨl gos ak ma nɨgɨnɨmil agɨnɨgab agak. Anɨb agek, bɨ an bɨ anɨb ak nop mɨñmɨñ yɨbɨl gɨnɨgab agak?
